page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: { Children}of the eighties play hundreds of assorted{games.}Older boys enjoy games like "had" or "tag", cricket, rounders and football. Had is a game for one person pursuing another. Rounders is a game where some one bowls a ball to a player with a bat who then hits the ball and runs round four posts. If they get all the way round,the team scores one rounder. The older girls{play}netball and elastic. Elastic is a game where two or more girls chant a poem whilst another jumps over, or on, the elastic being held by two other girls. Some of the younger children play war,The "A" Team and hide and seek. The"A"Team is a very popular television adventure series from America. The children like to act out the part of some of the characters in the series.
